title: 【咆哮向】mod太难装了
author: 注水の矿工
txt_content:
玩原版玩闷了，我想装个mod尝尝鲜，按照教程说的，我自己装了几个，可是—[slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand][slow_sand]
↑加载时卡住了
整么装个mod就那么难呢！！！！！！！！~~~~(>_<)~~~~ 
本人安装的是forge确认没装Modloader

replies.author: Coerce二號
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
好吧。。看到这个之后。。我笑了
{:10_514:}= =我去啊，把解压完的东西放到MODS就可以 了

replies.author: 注水の矿工
replies.txt_content: 本人表示完全按照教程去做，可是搞得我稀里糊涂

replies.author: Cpt.Dunn
replies.txt_content: 疑问贴请发到你问我答版块,谢谢
